evidence.claim: BackTable utilizes AWS for cloud hosting and infrastructure needs.
The platform is designed with HIPAA compliance in mind, ensuring secure handling of health-data transactions.
The company has published articles detailing their integrations with EHRs, indicating the use of FHIR standards.
BackTable employs PostgreSQL as part of its data storage solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse operations found.
